intro: Calectasia, commonly known as the star daisy, is a genus of flowering plants native to South Africa. These plants are characterized by their showy, daisy-like flowers that typically feature a central cluster of small, star-shaped blooms surrounded by ray florets. Calectasia species are members of the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies, sunflowers, and other composite flowers. They are often cultivated for their ornamental value due to their vibrant colors and compact growth habit. The genus includes around 40 species, many of which are adapted to thrive in arid and semi-arid environments.
